casebody.data:
Fourth Department,

December, 2001

(December 21, 2001) Michael Said, Individually and as Parent and Natural Guardian of Mark Said, Respondent-Appellant, v Gabriel A. Assaad et al., Appellants-Respondents, et al., Defendants. (Appeal No. 1.) [734 NYS2d 524]

Appeals and cross appeal unanimously dismissed without costs (see, CPLR 5501 [a] [1], [2]). (Appeals from Order of Supreme Court, Onondaga County, Major, J. — New Trial.) Present — Pigott, Jr., P. J., Hayes, Wisner, Kehoe and Burns, JJ.
